title-part.text: FRAMES, CASINGS OR BEDS OF ENGINES, MACHINES OR APPARATUS, NOT SPECIFIC TO ENGINES, MACHINES OR APPARATUS PROVIDED FOR ELSEWHERE
STANDS
SUPPORTS

note.note-paragraph:
Attention is drawn to the following places:
B21B31/02 Metal-rolling stand frames
G01D11/30 Supports specially adapted for indicating or recording instruments.
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Frames or casings of engines, machines or apparatus
Frames serving as machinery beds
for reciprocating engines or similar machines
for housing crankshafts
of tunnel type, i.e. wherein the crankshaft can only be introduced axially

reference.text: for engines or machines with star-shaped cylinder arrangement F16M1/023

title-part.text: specially adapted for engines or machines with star-shaped cylinder arrangement
facilitating assembly of power-transmitting parts of engines or machines, e.g. of connecting-rods
Assembling bearings in casings, e.g. having anchor bolts
for housing movable engine or machine parts other than crankshafts, e.g. valve-gear housings
for rotary engines or similar machines
characterised by being built-up of sheet material or welded parts
Portable or wheeled frames or beds, e.g. for emergency power-supply aggregates, compressor sets

reference.text: construction of vehicles in general B60 - B62

title-part.text: Engine beds, i.e. means for supporting engines or machines on foundations
Details of attaching or adjusting engine beds, frames, or supporting-legs on foundation or base
Attaching non-moving engine parts, e.g. cylinder blocks

reference.text: elastic or equivalent mounting for absorbing vibrations F16F, especially F16F15/04

title-part.text: Special layout of foundations with respect to machinery to be supported
Stands or trestles as supports for apparatus or articles placed thereon

CPC-specific-text.text: Stands for scientific apparatus such as gravitational force meters

reference.text: without heads F16K13/00; easels or stands for blackboards or the like A47B97/04; show-stands A47F7/00; for workmen E04G1/32;

CPC-specific-text.text: sockets or holders for poles or posts E04H12/22

reference.text: ; supporting, suspending for lighting devices F21V21/00; special modifications for particular apparatus or articles, see the appropriate subclasses

title-part.text: Heads
Means for attachment of apparatus
Means allowing adjustment of the apparatus relatively to the stand

CPC-specific-text.text: Allowing quick release of the apparatus

title-part.text: allowing pivoting
around a vertical axis
around a horizontal axis

CPC-specific-text.text: the horizontal axis being the roll axis, e.g. for creating a landscape-portrait rotation

title-part.text: in more than one direction

CPC-specific-text.text: the axis of rotation intersecting in a single point, e.g. by using gimbals

title-part.text: with ball-joint

CPC-specific-text.text: ; adjustable mountings employing universal joints for lighting devices F21V21/26 - F21V21/30

title-part.text: Details concerning attachment of head-supporting legs, with or without actuation of locking members thereof
with mechanism for moving the apparatus relatively to the stand
Undercarriages with or without wheels

CPC-specific-text.text: for rolling, i.e. for creating a landscape-portrait rotation
the axis of rotation intersecting in a single point, e.g. gimbals
comprising means allowing sideward adjustment, i.e. left-right translation of the head relatively to the undercarriage
comprising means allowing depth adjustment, i.e. forward-backward translation of the head relatively to the undercarriage

title-part.text: with approximately constant height, e.g. with constant length of column or of legs
changeable in height or length of legs, also for transport only,

CPC-specific-text.text: e.g. by means of tubes screwed into each other
Members limiting spreading of legs, e.g. "umbrella legs"

reference.text: for supports with three or more telescoping legs F16M11/34

CPC-specific-text.text: Members preventing slipping of the feet

reference.text: for supports with three or more telescoping legs F16M11/36

title-part.text: by telescoping, with or without folding

reference.text: details concerning the constructional features of telescoping parts only F16B7/10

title-part.text: Undercarriages for supports with one single telescoping pillar
with co-moving side-struts
Undercarriages for supports with three or more telescoping legs
Members limiting spreading of legs
Members preventing slipping of the feet
by folding

CPC-specific-text.text: , e.g. pivoting or scissors tong mechanisms

title-part.text: by means of coilable or bendable legs
with arrangement for propelling the support
Other supports for positioning apparatus or articles

reference.text: ; adapted to be stuck in the ground A45F3/44

CPC-specific-text.text: ; sockets or holders for poles or posts E04H12/22

title-part.text: Means for steadying hand-held apparatus or articles

reference.text: supports for measuring instruments G01D11/30; supports for casings of remote control switching devices H01H9/025

CPC-specific-text.text: integral with the apparatus or articles to be supported

title-part.text: for supporting on, or attaching to, an object, e.g. tree, gate, window-frame, cycle
for supporting on, or holding steady relative to, a person, e.g. by chains

CPC-specific-text.text: , e.g. rifle butt or pistol grip supports, supports attached to the chest or head

reference.text: apparatus or arrangements for taking photographs or for projecting or viewing them G03B

title-part.text: also serviceable for other purposes, e.g. to be used as spade, chair, ski-stick
for use as a walking-cane
Details of stands or supports
Locking means
for rotational movement
by friction
by positive interaction, e.g. male-female connections
for translational movement
by friction
by positive interaction, e.g. male-female connections
Balancing means
for balancing rotational movement of the head
for panning movement
for balancing rotational movement of the undercarriage
for panning movement
for balancing translational movement of the head
for balancing translational movement of the undercarriage
Arms
Scissors arms
Parallelogram arms
with a special structure, e.g. reinforced or adapted for space reduction
being part of the head
being part of the undercarriage
Foot or support base
